Subject: Schedules are not launching
Description: Schedules fail to execute. Task Scheduler shows Event ID's 203 and 101, Operational Code: Launch Failure. I have gone over permissions in article https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/z-kb-articles-salesforce/page/kA04u0000000I7rCAE.html and confirmed account is in the Administrators group. The account has Log On As Batch Job granted in User RIghts Assignment in Local Policies of Local Security Policy. The account has full control on C:WindowsTasks (folder is empty) The account has full control on C:WindowsSystem32\Tasks (folder has the jobs scheduled) LogsApplication suggests "Login failed for user"
Solution_Comment__c: Granted permissions on DB for the service account. Issue resolved.
